data.title: spaceKLIP: JWST coronagraphy data data reduction and analysis pipeline
data.name: spaceKLIP
data.description: Pipeline for reducing JWST high-contrast imaging data. Published in Kammerer et al. 2022 and Carter et al. 2022.

evidence: "SpaceKLIP is a data reduction pipeline for JWST high-contrast imaging. The current release has been tested with NIRCam and MIRI coronagraphy data."
Repo owner is the GitHub organization "spacetelescope", associated with the Space Telescope Science Institute (institutional project).
README provides links to documentation and installation instructions but no mention of package managers or binaries, implying use via the source repository and docs-linked install process.
